Class ib_a_FilterWholeImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuze.ib_a_Ops
      • reuze.ib_a_FilterWholeImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.BufferedImageOp, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ib_a_FilterBinary, ib_FilterCaustics, ib_FilterCellular, ib_FilterContour, ib_FilterDespeckle, ib_FilterDiffusion, ib_FilterEdge, ib_FilterEmboss, ib_FilterEqualize, ib_FilterFlush3D, ib_FilterLevels, ib_FilterLight, ib_FilterMaximum, ib_FilterMedian, ib_FilterMinimum, ib_FilterNoiseReduction, ib_FilterOil, ib_FilterPlasma, ib_FilterQuantize, ib_FilterQuilt, ib_FilterShade, ib_FilterShape, ib_FilterSmear, ib_FilterWarp

    public abstract class ib_a_FilterWholeImage
extends ib_a_Ops
implements java.io.Serializable
    A filter which acts as a superclass for filters which need to have the whole image in memory to do their stuff.
    See Also:
